mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patients ( id, name, birthday, gender, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at, deleted_by, deleted_at ) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{gender},'太郎',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, null, null, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, birthday, gender, created_by as createdBy, created_at as createdAt, updated_by as updatedBy, updated_at as updatedAt, deleted_by as deletedBy, deleted_at as deletedAt FROM patients WHERE id = #{id}
